ComicInfo.Title: Nazi Skinhead Slaughterama
ComicInfo.Summary:
A hilarious and gory tongue-in-cheek story, Toe Tag Riot is about a punk rock band cursed to become zombies whenever they perform their music! The band goes on a last cross-country tour in search of the cure to their affliction, but being the ethical sometimes-zombie punks that they are, Toe Tag Riot uses their zombie superpowers to rid the world of racists, homophobes, misogynists and all kinds of other nasty people. Read the LGBT-positive book that the Westboro Baptist Church themselves accidentally endorsed and then felt really stupid about doing! Guest appearance by Andy Hurley from Fall Out Boy!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tristan Jones & Doug Garbark | 1 | B | Cover B | Rod Reis | 3 | RE | Black Cat Comics Exclusive Cover | Anna Fitzpatrick | 4 | RE | Hot Topic Exclusive Variant Cover | Dave Bullock, Doug Garbark & Jonathan Brandon Sawyer (Banner) | 2 | RE | Kickstarter Exclusive Wraparound Cover | Vincent Kukua & John Rauch | 6 | RE | Phantom Exclusive Variant Cover | Simon Fraser | 7 | RE | Phantom Exclusive Rare Variant Cover (Black & White) | Jonathan Brandon Sawyer | 8 | RE | Third Eye Comics Exclusive Cover | Megan Hutchison | 5 | LE | Rare Limited Edition Kickstarter Exclusive Cover, Limited to 55 & Signed by Andy Hurley | Sean Von Gorman | 9 | Notes:
The Hot Topic Exclusive Variant cover is a homage of the Beatles' album Abbey Road.The Phantom Exclusive Rare Variant cover is a homage of the Ramones' album Ramones.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-13 10:10:14. [CVDB471426]
